#summary Component Reference

= Components =

[ReferenceComponentAccelerometerSensor AccelerometerSensor] - Sensor that can detect shaking and measure acceleration in 3 dimensions

[ReferenceComponentButton Button] - Simple button component

[ReferenceComponentCanvas Canvas] - Simple canvas component

[ReferenceComponentCheckBox CheckBox] - Simple checkbox component

[ReferenceComponentEmailPicker EmailPicker] - Text box using auto-completion to pick out an email address from contacts

[ReferenceComponentForm Form] - Root component container

[ReferenceComponentImage Image] - Component for displaying images and animations

[ReferenceComponentLabel Label] - Label containing a text string or an image

[ReferenceComponentOrientationSensor OrientationSensor] - Sensor that can measure absolute orientation in 3 dimensions

[ReferenceComponentPanel Panel] - Container that can be placed within a Form or another container

[ReferenceComponentPasswordTextBox PasswordTextBox] - Text box for entering passwords

[ReferenceComponentPhone Phone] - Simple Phone component

[ReferenceComponentRadioButton RadioButton] - Simple radio button component

[ReferenceComponentTextBox TextBox] - Simple text box component

[ReferenceComponentTimer Timer] - Simple Timer component

= Layouts =

[ReferenceComponentFrameLayout 	FrameLayout] - Frame layout for Simple components

[ReferenceComponentLinearLayout LinearLayout] - Linear layout for placing components horizontally or vertically

[ReferenceComponentTableLayout TableLayout] - Layout component allowing subcomponents to be placed in tabular form
